ticket.title: Way to render widget
ticket.original-body:
If I have two widgets in one group widget :sidebar_shoe_advisor, :group => :widget_asset do end
widget :events_sidebar_myasics, :group => :widget_asset do end when I use render_widget :sidebar_shoe_advisor, it creates #<Qor::Widget::ViewSetting id: 1063, template_bundle_id: 5, widget_name: "sidebar_shoe_advisor", widget_group: "widget_asset", ....>, but the widget_group value should be empty.
So I think we should use render_widget :widget => :sidebar_shoe_advisor to render a separate widget, use render_widget :group => :widget_asset to render a group widget.
